Please try the update uploaded by the_laser. I had the eyepatch problem as well. To be exact I installed the game again (after having backed up my save folder in order not to start from the beginning) and applied the_laser's update. I was at episode 4. I restarted the episode and the eyepatch has gone. I do not know if you have installed the scene4all upload, if you can install the_laser's update above it. You can try this first if you want to avoid reinstalling the game and backing up your saves.

By the way, this is the update that worked for me
